languages.text: "Главный кормчий, Лорд-капитан. Стою за штурвалом этой посуди... вашего корабля и руковожу идиотами, которые отвечают за сопутствующие системы. Проще говоря — я тот, кто не дает нам влететь в астероид или разрывную гравитационную волну, когда мы находимся в пустоте".

"I'm the Master Helmsman, Lord Cap'n. I stand at the wheel of this here tub... I mean, your vessel, and bark commands at the idiots who tend to its related systems. In layman's terms, I'm the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we're travelling through the void."
languages.original_text: "Главный кормчий, Лорд-капитан. Стою за штурвалом этой посуди... вашего корабля и руковожу идиотами, которые отвечают за сопутствующие системы. Проще говоря — я тот, кто не дает нам влететь в астероид или разрывную гравитационную волну, когда мы находимся в пустоте".

traits.locale_text: "I am the Chief Helmsman, Lord Cap'n. I stand at the steering wheel of the barge... I mean, your vessel, and bark commands at the idiots who tend to the vital systems. In layman terms I am the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we are traversing the void."

In layman terms I am the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we are traversing the void."

In layman's terms, I'm the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we're travelling through the void."

languages.text: “我是舵手长，船长老大。我负责操纵这个在天上飞的大脸盆……我是说，操纵你的飞船，还负责对其他相关系统的白痴发号施令。说直白点儿，咱们在虚空中旅行的时候，我就是那个不让咱们的飞船撞上小行星或者破坏性引力波的那个人。”
languages.original_text: "I'm the Master Helmsman, Lord Cap'n. I stand at the wheel of this here tub... I mean, your vessel, and bark commands at the idiots who tend to its related systems. In layman's terms, I'm the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we're travelling through the void."

traits.locale_text: “我是舵手长，船长老大。我负责操纵这个在天上飞的大脸盆……我是说，操纵你的飞船，还负责对其他相关系统的白痴发号施令。说直白点儿，咱们在虚空中旅行的时候，我就是那个不让咱们的飞船撞上小行星或者破坏性引力波的那个人。”

languages.text: «Soy el maestro timonel, L{mf|ord|ady} Capi. Me encargo del timonel de esta bañe... de esta insigne nave y me dedico a gritarles a los idiotas que se ocupan de sus sistemas. En resumidas cuentas, soy el que se ocupa de que no nos la peguemos contra un asteroide ni con una onda de gravedad distorsionada cuando viajamos por el vacío».
languages.original_text: "I'm the Master Helmsman, Lord Cap'n. I stand at the wheel of this here tub... I mean, your vessel, and bark commands at the idiots who tend to its related systems. In layman's terms, I'm the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we're travelling through the void."

traits.locale_text: «Soy el maestro timonel, L{mf|ord|ady} Capi. Me encargo del timonel de esta bañe... de esta insigne nave y me dedico a gritarles a los idiotas que se ocupan de sus sistemas. En resumidas cuentas, soy el que se ocupa de que no nos la peguemos contra un asteroide ni con una onda de gravedad distorsionada cuando viajamos por el vacío».

languages.text: 「私はマスター・ヘルムスマンです、ロード・キャプテン。この船の舵を握っております…船を操り、関連するシステムを管理するバカどもに指示を下しています。平たく言えば、虚空を旅している時に、小惑星や重力波との衝突を避けることが私の役目です」
languages.original_text: "I'm the Master Helmsman, Lord Cap'n. I stand at the wheel of this here tub... I mean, your vessel, and bark commands at the idiots who tend to its related systems. In layman's terms, I'm the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we're travelling through the void."

traits.locale_text: 「私は操舵手長です、ロード・キャプテン。この船の舵を握っております…船を操り、関連するシステムを管理するバカどもに指示を下しています。平たく言えば、虚空を旅している時に、小惑星や重力波との衝突を避けることが私の役目です」

languages.text: "Ich bin der Hauptsteuermann, Lord Cap'n. Ich stehe am Ruder dieses Schrott... Ich meine, Eures Schiffes ... und brülle den Idioten Befehle zu, die für seine Systeme verantwortlich sind. Laienhaft ausgedrückt, verhindere ich, dass wir auf unserer Reise durch die Leere einen Asteroiden rammen oder in eine Gravitationswelle geraten."
languages.original_text: "I'm the Master Helmsman, Lord Cap'n. I stand at the wheel of this here tub... I mean, your vessel, and bark commands at the idiots who tend to its related systems. In layman's terms, I'm the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we're travelling through the void."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin der Hauptsteuermann, Lord Cap'n. Ich stehe am Ruder dieses Schrott... Ich meine, Eures Schiffes ... und brülle den Idioten Befehle zu, die für seine Systeme verantwortlich sind. Laienhaft ausgedrückt, verhindere ich, dass wir auf unserer Reise durch die Leere einen Asteroiden rammen oder in eine Gravitationswelle geraten."

languages.text: « Je suis le maître timonier, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Je tiens la barre de cette boîte de conserve... enfin, de votre vaisseau... et j'aboie des ordres aux imbéciles affectés aux systèmes de pilotage... En d'autres termes, c'est moi qui nous évite de percuter un astéroïde ou de traverser une onde gravitationnelle dangereuse lorsqu'on se promène dans le vide. »
languages.original_text: "I'm the Master Helmsman, Lord Cap'n. I stand at the wheel of this here tub... I mean, your vessel, and bark commands at the idiots who tend to its related systems. In layman's terms, I'm the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we're travelling through the void."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le maître timonier, {mf|seigneur-cap'taine|seigneure-cap'taine}. Je tiens la barre de cette boîte de conserve... enfin, de votre vaisseau... et j'aboie des ordres aux imbéciles affectés aux systèmes de pilotage... En d'autres termes, c'est moi qui nous évite de percuter un astéroïde ou de traverser une onde gravitationnelle dangereuse lorsqu'on se promène dans le vide. »

languages.text: "Başserdümen'im Lord Kaptan. Bu teknede... Yani geminizde dümen başında dururum ve sistemlerle ilgilenen mankafalara emirler yağdırırım. Amiyane tabirle, uçsuzda seyahat ederken asteroitlere veya bozucu yerçekimsel dalgalara çarpmamızı engelleyen kişiyim."
languages.original_text: "I'm the Master Helmsman, Lord Cap'n. I stand at the wheel of this here tub... I mean, your vessel, and bark commands at the idiots who tend to its related systems. In layman's terms, I'm the one who stops us from running into an asteroid or a disruptive gravitational wave when we're travelling through the void."

traits.locale_text: "Başserdümenim Lord Kaptan. Bu teknede... Yani geminizde dümen başında dururum ve sistemlerle ilgilenen mankafalara emirler yağdırırım. Amiyane tabirle, uçsuzda seyahat ederken asteroitlere veya bozucu yerçekimsel dalgalara çarpmamızı engelleyen kişiyim."
